long_description: You can count on REI Training pants to keep you comfortable, especially during tough workouts. Breathable fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly; fabric protects skin from harmful sunlight with a UPF 50+ rating. Elastic drawcord waist ensures a comfortable fit. Side ankle zippers make dressing over footwear easy; reflective zipper piping enhances visibility. Open handwarmer pockets and zippered rear pocket store extras. REI Training pants offer a close-to-body, athletic fit.
short_description: You can count on REI Training pants to keep you comfortable, especially during tough workouts.
